TextView.android:text: QUARTERLY MAINTENANCE SCHEDULE \n(Coinciding with Flight Inspection)
Angle Alarm at ±7.5 % change in GP
Displacement Sensitivity Alarm at ± 25% Change in sector Width
Power Alarm, on Reduction of power by 20%
System reversion to Lower category and giving warning at designated control point
Warning at RCSU, due primary power supply failure at GP site
Saving of Station Configuration file in Local PC
Saving of Station Configuration/PMDT SW in separate USB Drive/CD
12. Status of Earths, Lightening & Surge Protection Syatem
Earth Resistance of Lightening Protection System
LED Indication of Lightening Protection System
Earth Resistance of Surge Protection System
LED indication of Surge Protection System
